DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate feasibility use low dose propranolol people fibromyalgia .
DOC.detailed_description: The main purpose study collect pilot feasibility study data use low dose propranolol help treat fibromyalgia . The investigator plan compare 20mg twice day dosage propranolol 10mg twice day dosage propranolol placebo . The design 3 arm , double blind randomize control trial . The investigator also test ECG respiratory assessment part safety screen feasible assessment respiratory sinus arrhythmia . Propranolol indicate treat pain . However , previous study show low dose propranolol re-regulate adrenergic dysfunction reduce pain people chronic musculoskeletal pain . However , investigator aim develop new indication drug .
DOC.criteria: Females fibromyalgia ( meeting 1990 American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) FMS criterion 2010 ACR FMS criterion ) age 1865 least 1 year symptom sedentary ( exercise less 120 min per week ) . General Health Criteria : Uncontrolled/unstable illness ( physician diagnose , selfreport ) Pregnancy plan pregnant next year Having Asthma require medication treatment include inhaler Type I diabetes Type II diabetes require medical therapy lead hypoglycemia Having acute pain neuropathic pain Participation exercise psychological treatment study past 2 year Having know serious psychopathology : Psychosis , history inpatient psychiatric admission past year , active suicidal intent , history selfinjurious behavior past year , history recreational IV drug use , substance abuse history past year ) Cardiovascular Criteria : Having know cardiovascular disease ( selfreport , physician diagnose ) Pacemaker Bradycardia ( rest heartrate le 55 bpm ) Resting diastolic BP < 55 mmHG systolic BP < 100 mmHG ECG show prolonged PR interval > .2 sec ECG show irregular PR interval ECG show incongruence P wave QRS Medication Criteria Allergy intolerance beta blocker Current use follow drug : Antihypertensive drug Neuroleptics Monoamine oxidase inhibitor Tizanidine Amphetaminebased medication Bupropion Mirtazapine Tricyclics : daily dose great 75mg amitriptyline equivalent Benzodiazepine : daily dose great 5mg diazepam equivalent Asthmatic medicine , include inhaler Participants may include minimum 4 week physician prescribed termination drug
